alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Woods, southern Alfalfa, Grant, northwestern Garfield and northeastern Major Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Medford to 4 miles west of Lambert. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Medford, Helena, Pond Creek, Carmen, Cleo Springs, Kremlin, Goltry, Jet, Aline, Nash, Hunter, Hillsdale, Dacoma, Carrier, Jefferson, Lambert, and Great Salt Plains Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
